thread.title: Woman arrested 'after being filmed having sex with boys aged 12 and 14 in public toilet'
thread.title_full: Woman arrested 'after being filmed having sex with boys aged 12 and 14 in public toilet'

author: Natalie Evans
title: Woman arrested 'after being filmed having sex with boys aged 12 and 14 in public toilet'
text:
News Woman arrested 'after being filmed having sex with boys aged 12 and 14 in public toilet' Maria Lynn Baker, 28, was held after police were reportedly shown the footage by another woman following an argument Share By Natalie Evans Chris Murphy 06:19, 13 FEB 2017 Maria Lynn Baker, 28, was arrested on suspicion of sex with two underage boys (Photo: Chris Murphy) Share Get   
A woman has been arrested after she was allegedly filmed having sex with boys aged 12 and 14 in a public toilet. 
Maria Lynn Baker was held by police in Florida early Saturday morning on two counts of lewd and lascivious battery. 
Officers from Ocala Police Department were called to an argument where a woman is believed to have shown cops footage of Baker having sex with an underage boy. 
The 28-year-old was arrested by Detective Melissa Buetti on suspicion of having sex with a pair of underage boys in a public convenience. Read More Man detained after sending schoolgirl Kayleigh Haywood explicit messages days before she was raped and murdered The boys were aged 12 and 14 (pic posed by model) (Photo: Getty) 
Buetti was told Baker was having sex with two 12- to 14-year-old boys inside a toilet at the War Memorial, in Silver Springs Boulevard, according to OPD officials. Read More 
Police told the newspaper that she could face more charges, as they believe there could be additional victims. Like us on Facebook
